thread.section_title: Nebraska Furniture Mart Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Nebraska Furniture Mart | nfm.com | 5 of 470
thread.title: JDW
thread.title_full: Nebraska Furniture Mart reviewed by JDW

author: JDW
title: JDW
text: I ordered hardwood flooring, carpet, and several pieces of furniture from NFM. The products are very good quality, and the customer service is excellent. The only reason I did not give 5 stars is because delivery could be better. I had a couple of damaged pieces that had to be replaced, and the delivery company scratched my new hardwoods (that I purchased from NFM). The customer service afterwards has made up for the inconvenience.
